data.prayer: Please, teach the 616 believers in Nenets, Russia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nenets, Russia

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Nenets, Russia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Nenets, Russia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 616 believers in Nenets to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, I pray that all the Alutor people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Alutor people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Alutor people is yours.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Nenets, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Nenets
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Nenets to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

location.name: Nenets
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Uzbeki, Akhvakh, Aghul, Chechen, Lezgin
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Uzbeki (9,800), Akhvakh (6,800), Aghul (35,000), Chechen (5,300), Lezgin (195,000)
